Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19642077] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8 μM), Bacillus subtilis(MIC=8 μM), Listeria monocytogenes(MIC=4 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=8 μM), Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=1 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans(MIC=4-8 μM), Trichosporon beigelli(MIC=1 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19642077] 0% hemolysis at 100 μM , 3% hemolysis at 200 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against Candida albicans, Trichosporon beigelli

Literature.Title: Effect of Leucine and Lysine substitution on the antimicrobial activity and evaluation of the mechanism of the HPA3NT3 analog peptide.
Literature.Author: Gopal R, Park SC, Ha KJ, Cho SJ, Kim SW, Song PI, Nah JW, Park Y, Hahm KS
